experience.title: Perfect Mix of Experience and Expertise
experience.description: Over 10 years of experience in Agile Software Development
experience.angular-experience: Starting with Angular 2, I worked the last 6 years in 4 major projects with Angular, creating successful single-page application.
experience.typescript-experience: In 2016 I switched from JavaScript to Typescript and experienced the benefits of type safety in many projects.
experience.java-experience: With 10 years of experience in Java and several years with frameworks like EE and Spring I love to solve complex backend challenges and still learn new things.
